quote: Will you be my forever, Donia?
author: Melissa Marr,  Darkest Mercy

quote: Honey! Bring down a copy of my will - and an eraser!
author: Woody Allen

quote: Barzûl!
author: Christopher Paolini,  Eldest

quote: Ow, Todd? Ow?
author: Patrick Ness,  The Knife of Never Letting Go

quote: I'll love you to ruins.
author: Michelle Hodkin,  The Retribution of Mara Dyer

quote: Babe!
author: Janet Evanovich

quote: because he's Will
author: Philip Pullman,  The Amber Spyglass

quote: Who dares, win
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: Loki'd!
author: Tom Hiddleston

quote: I can't go on, I'll go on.
author: Samuel Beckett,  I Can't Go On, I'll Go On: A Samuel Beckett Reader

quote: I may not be able to remember your name, but I remember your address and what time you leave in the mornings. Your name isn’t Rob, is it?
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
تركي الدخيل,  كيف تربح المال بأقل مجهود!

quote: If you want me again look for me under your boot soles.
author: Walt Whitman,  Leaves of Grass

quote: My friends are my estate.
author: Emily Dickinson

quote: On Knowledge: You know that I know you know, but I want you to know that I know you know I know you know I know. It’s important for you to know that, you know?
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: Tell me who admires and loves you, and I will tell you who you are.
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

quote: Do not allow me to forget you
author: Gabriel Garcí­a Márquez,  Of Love and Other Demons

quote: Brownie Mix [10w] + {Couplet} Betwixt hell and the River Styx,I'll be shitting bricks.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: You know that I know you know, but I want you to know that I know you know I know you know I know. It’s important for you to know that, you know?
author: Jarod Kintz,  The Days of Yay are Here! Wake Me Up When They're Over.

quote: Gimme an S! A T! An O! A C! Followed by a K-H-O-L-M! What's it spell? HEAD FUCK.- Jane
author: J.R. Ward,  Lover Unbound

quote: Laters, baby.
author: E.L. James,  Fifty Shades of Grey

quote: I will love you even when I am dust on the wind.
author: Nalini Singh,  Archangel's Blade

quote: When your will is God's will, you will have your will.
author: Charles Haddon Spurgeon

quote: Bishop was all done with the witty converstaion. 'Will you swear?'And Myrnin said, shockingly, 'I will.' And he proceeded to, a string of swearwords that made Claire blink. He ended with, '—frothy fool-born apple-john! Cheater of vandals and defiler of dead dogs!' and did another twirl and bow. He looked up with a red, red grin that was more like a leer. 'Is that what you meant, my lord?
author: Rachel Caine,  Feast of Fools

quote: I come from the New York theatre world, and I have a lot of gay male friends, so this friendship of Will and Grace's isn't such a stretch.
author: Debra Messing

quote: Come sleep with me: We won't make Love,Love will make us.
author: Julio Cortázar

quote: You must go on.I can’t go on.I’ll go on.
author: Samuel Beckett,  The Unnamable

quote: Tell me whom you haunt and I’ll tell you who you are.
author: André Breton

quote: I only have so much willpower, Helen,"he whispered. "And since you apparently sleep in the most ridiculously transparent tank top I've ever seen, I'm going to have to ask you to get under the covers before I do something stupid.
author: Josephine Angelini,  Starcrossed

quote: Lord, grant that my work increase knowledge and help other men. Failing that, Lord, grant that it will not lead to man’s destruction. Failing that, Lord, grant that my article in Brain be published before the destruction takes place.
author: Walker Percy,  Love in the Ruins

quote: Are you implying that shreds of my reputation remain intact?"Will demanded with mock horror. "Clearly I have been doing something wrong. Or not something wrong, as the case may be."He banged on the side of the carriage. "Thomas! We must away at once to the nearest brothel. I seek scandal and low companionship.
author: Cassandra Clare,  Clockwork Angel

quote: Don't make me angry-kiss you.
author: Rainbow Rowell,  Fangirl

quote: Promise me you'll never forget me because if I thought you would, I'd never leave.
author: A.A. Milne

quote: I'll find you. There is no place in this world you can hide from me. I'm watching.Love, Dimitri
author: Richelle Mead,  Spirit Bound

quote: I'll follow you, even to death—but I won't live with you any more.
author: Prosper Mérimée,  Carmen

quote: You shall know the truth and the truth shall make you mad.
author: Aldous Huxley

quote: Now I've gone for too longLiving like I'm not aliveSo I'm going to start over tonightBeginning with you and I
author: Hayley Williams

quote: I will follow you to the ends of the world.
author: Khaled Hosseini,  A Thousand Splendid Suns

quote: Take my hand and we'll make it - I swear
author: Jon Bon Jovi,  Best of Bon Jovi

quote: Come live with me and be my Love, And we will all the pleasures prove
author: Christopher Marlowe,  The Complete Plays and Poems

quote: So for now,I will miss you like I’ll never see you again,And the next time I see you,I will kiss you like I’ll never kiss you again,And when I fall asleep beside you I will fall asleep as if I’ll never wake up again,because I don’t know if I will.I don’t know if I will.- I Will Love You Like The World Is Ending
author: Charlotte Eriksson,  Empty Roads & Broken Bottles; in search for The Great Perhaps

quote: Snob [10w[ I'm throwing a party so exclusive I'm not even invited.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: I have drunken deep of joy,And I will taste no other wine tonight.
author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quote: Flatter me, and I may not believe you. Criticize me, and I may not like you. Ignore me, and I may not forgive you. Encourage me, and I will not forget you. Love me and I may be forced to love you.
author: William Arthur Ward

quote: Hi-Yo Silver! Away! [10w] "Kimosabe, me wanna fuckum Pamela, pronto.My teepee's blue."Tonto
author: Beryl Dov

quote: My turn shall also come:I sense the spreading of a wing.
author: Osip Mandelstam,  The Selected Poems

quote: You’ve changed me forever. And I’ll never forget you.
author: Kiera Cass,  The Elite

quote: You don't know me. You know one me, just like I know one you. And you can't know every me, and I can't know every you.
author: David Levithan,  Every You, Every Me

quote: If I promise you I'll show up fifteen minutes late, I'll always arrive on time.
author: Jarod Kintz,  It Occurred to Me

quote: I assess the power of a will by how much resistance, pain, torture it endures and knows how to turn to its advantage
author: Friedrich Nietzsche
